text: The 2026 Winter Olympics, officially known as the Games of the XXV Olympiad, is a future international athletic event that will happen in Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy. ==Host City== 2026 Winter Olympics at 134th IOC Session on 23 June 2019 in Lusanne, Swizterland. 2026 Host City: * Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy ==Broadcasting== * – Grupo Globo * – NBC ==References== Winter Olympics Category:Scheduled sports events Category:Winter Olympics in Europe Category:2020s in Italy
title: 2026 Winter Olympics
